name: Pimp or Die
description:
Survive as long as you can in this endless-wave-roguelike-dungeon-crawler by pimping your die !

 After each enemy, you will be presented 3 Perks that will enhance your build for the rest of the run. 

Will you get OP by picking the right perks or will you die ungracefully because of some lack of judgement ?

Check for yourself !
